p: To quantify the contribution of each sample in a latent factor, MOFA assigns factor weights such that similar samples (in terms of the variance explained in the low-dimensional latent space) will have similar weighting. To identify similar latent factors between the GE-only and AS, APA, and IR-only models (Fig. 5a and Supplementary Fig. 4c), pairwise Pearson correlations were computed between latent factor weights using the R function cor.test().
